original_text: And these are the names of the sons of Levi according to their generations; Gershon, and Kohath, and Merari: and the years of the life of Levi were an hundred thirty and seven years.
korean_text: 레위의 아들들의 이름은 그들의 족보대로 이러하니 게르손과 고핫과 므라리요 레위의 나이는 백삼십칠 세였으며

sentences.original_text: And these are the names of the sons of Levi
and the years of the life of Levi
were an hundred thirty and seven years.
